thread.title: Stars and activists unite to say 'Time's Up' at the BAFTAs

title: Stars and activists unite to say 'Time's Up' at the BAFTAs
text:
Stars and activists unite to say 'Time's Up' at the BAFTAs Monday, February 19, 2018 - 01:46 
Celebrities wore black and brought activists to a politically charged BAFTA award ceremony on Sunday night, in order to promote the Time's Up movement against sexual harassment.   
Celebrities wore black and brought activists to a politically charged BAFTA award ceremony on Sunday night, in order to promote the Time's Up movement against sexual harassment.  //reut.rs/2sDYlYz
